snippet: United States and British regulators have been in discussions with JPMorgan Chase for almost a month about the trading group that disclosed more than $2 billion in losses.
abstract: United States and British regulators have been in discussions with JPMorgan Chase for almost a month about the trading group that disclosed more than $2 billion in losses.

headline.main: Regulators Looking Into JPMorgan Trading Activities Before $2 Billion Loss
